level.text: Hearing shall be recorded and transcribed under the direction of the hearing examiner.
Upon payment of reasonable cost, a transcript of the proceeding shall be supplied to interested parties.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to December 29, 1989, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2210 (May 28, 1992).
